subject: Vulnerability with the Beaver Builder Plugin (Starter or Lite version) plugin

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
This ticket has been idle for over 24 hours.

If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation there.

For guidance, refer to this walkthrough:

action.text: Workflow **Vulnerability assigned to Manuel** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hello Andy, We are writing to you today to notify you about a security
vulnerability
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWukL6eYjGRlUZGKIx7PMBk85qjjgSl-2FSPnyMQ7EQ6FSqLZRBjS8qeuKe-2FrDA2jmJqPVjuXvqWICxocqpOqSezl0A-3DRisw_QhWGwQhi9gh0EXq7EEln2gTtEY8uizMkeyIYnCUJGKAVTyzk3RpP-2BBc1-2BhOGzERT5D0jGIt70VXRdqD02TyzamOpEkrbIFJjvCJjHERFJ-2FW-2FboLHk91bQ-2ByQHdihxQ2j7T0ucC1TGhse-2Bb1f8uHSQYm07Tg5gbzoHCSslqMxXrVSTJDSJE7M4zSkkPUTzsZXHs2JTIG8LGK8NseNzyl4aj-2BdsMV6Ca1oRPll350rBZ-2BLJHSyQ5HfH-2FzsP8Cts-2FNL>
discovered in the *Beaver Builder Plugin (Starter or Lite version)* plugin.
We detected the plugin on one or more of your websites:

• hmis2025
• steelpacific
• wymarkspecialty

*You can ignore this message if you have already updated Beaver Builder
Plugin (Starter or Lite version) to the latest version or have it set to
update automatically.*

The plugin has a vulnerability that makes it possible for authenticated
admin users to perform remote code execution
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWusCgiFMU6Fk5Q83U6Bsa0iCAtYxZqekYxAciEFQZTX7U6N2xfhoLxxQzMlkl7f77hA-3D-3D9ijZ_QhWGwQhi9gh0EXq7EEln2gTtEY8uizMkeyIYnCUJGKAVTyzk3RpP-2BBc1-2BhOGzERTeNs8Ur1RzQhhkIkVQu1yVG2L6F0L2ohdvs8MgDU4Ylu1MuEoPynynw-2F5vIhCqZNbI-2FDPHRNZe5JLJQ9mC5Yeik938cr8IqdY35vFODkKXk2lK-2FKcrlCsNiEBoRYrbiVuNhHlQjeIIfbVy-2Fr83jKvwS7ogaChqsBRZP5djuO39Siqk4sqmSSjrk1kdqpLMNpU>.


*We report administrator-level vulnerabilities because many sites have
multiple administrators. But even if you're the only administrator of your
site, we still recommend updating the plugin.*

This vulnerability affects versions before 2.9.1.1. We recommend updating
this plugin immediately to the latest version. To update, log in to MyKinsta
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWuqfnKhH4mQmF-2FbsgKxDIHqo-3DOaL7_QhWGwQhi9gh0EXq7EEln2gTtEY8uizMkeyIYnCUJGKAVTyzk3RpP-2BBc1-2BhOGzERT3kvwHICcaN0KHStAD9VuKcuv2HrTAqRJ6f4768vtL4s-2BYxMeA9tNKQKS-2BYuL6XeDvdpTTdlrn012sILm9rLWHrW80Fkly-2FIX1DncaFtAJ-2BWwxkJRxprRsUTNd9O1v-2BFH7mtdmTG2g8PhRgDeEUuj7lX4jLfRNQeWoawdQTQgNlHS0EjBiAUKC4wt49sLrC2w>
and go to WordPress sites > *site name* > Plugins and themes > Installed
plugins > Beaver Builder Plugin (Starter or Lite version), and click the
"Update" button.

To check all sites in your account for plugin updates, go to "WordPress
sites" and click the "Plugins" tab. That will list all the plugins
installed across all of your sites. A number greater than zero in the
"Updates" column means an update is available. (There's also a "Themes" tab
allowing you to update all themes installed on your sites.)

If you're interested in automatic plugin and theme updates with visual
regression testing, consider the Kinsta Automatic Updates
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWuowMewsD0yG1GbJf9SzgPBq992qho52qQ0fhXJGSTe-2FrdiVke-2B-2B9y36CrlFrkVTTBzJSYBaU2zMagshlsO2heoKpM28H6xMPPfA0lQqwWU-2FmEGA4-2FuZO-2Bo0B1-2BDBn9-2FtSmeOGRcfSZgLRtwhNr9vGOc-3DQvCR_QhWGwQhi9gh0EXq7EEln2gTtEY8uizMkeyIYnCUJGKAVTyzk3RpP-2BBc1-2BhOGzERT2gjAqvSf2fV3nh-2F8jlfwCMbPHMn6JP-2BWcyeqla6w0q6hOIoU-2BwUVsjgoUv1KrDoR95SKF-2FM3c5IcqJf0k6Xzct9jQUf4nTjIZUp2FQJNglmRrjS-2Bxi4dOb8-2FUGuwPjs6TL5bd8VO-2F3OgnX9I7k6JCWx2wfKppaGQVQUUDCpXl-2FRND2ouc3vmGCzdHn-2B7Cm9k>
add-on. To activate Kinsta Automatic Updates, go to MyKinsta > WordPress
sites > *site name* > Plugins and themes and click the "Auto-update
settings" button. Then select "Kinsta Automatic Updates."

We detected this vulnerability on June 20th, 2025, at 3:12 PM UTC, but due
to the time difference between scanning for vulnerabilities and sending
notifications, you may have already updated the plugin.

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact our support team.

Thank you for being a Kinsta client!
